00031 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00032 {
00033   createinfo(argc, argv);
00034 
00035   int cm=1;
00036   int par=0;
00037   int overwrite=0;
00038 
00039   if (argc < 3) {
00040     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction parafile\n"
00041             "\n   -p PARITY       project to parity"
00042             "\n   -o              overwrite parameter file\n",
00043             argv[0]);
00044     exit(-1);
00045   }
00046 
00047   int c;  
00048   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "op:")) != -1)
00049     switch (c) {
00050     case 'o':
00051       overwrite = 1;
00052       break;
00053     case 'p':
00054       par = atoi(optarg);
00055       break;
00056     }
00057   
00058   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00059   char* parafile = argv[optind+1];
00060 
00061   Interaction Int;
00062   readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile);
00063   Int.cm = cm;
00064 
00065   Parameterization P;
00066   Para q;
00067   readParafromFile(&P, &q, parafile); 
00068 
00069   SlaterDet Q;
00070   SlaterDetAux X;
00071 
00072   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00073   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00074   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00075 
00076   if (!par)
00077     par = (Q.A%2) ? -1 : +1;
00078 
00079   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00080   
00081   // orient SlaterDet
00082   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00083 
00084   // normalize SlaterDet
00085   normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00086 
00087   // calculate the observables
00088   Observables Obs;
00089   calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);
00090 
00091   FILE* outfp;
00092   if (overwrite) {
00093 
00094     backup(parafile);
00095     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
00096     if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
00097       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
00098       exit(-1);
00099     }
00100   } else {
00101     outfp = stdout;
00102   }
00103 
00104   fprintinfo(outfp);
00105 
00106   fprintf(outfp, "\n# calculated %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00107           "# using %s interaction\n", 
00108           cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, Int.name);
00109 
00110   fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00111 
00112   fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00113   fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00114   P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00115  
00116   fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00117   writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00118 
00119   if (overwrite) 
00120     fclose(outfp);
00121 
00122   return 0;
00123 }
